pages.text: Okusinziira ku ekyo twassa etteeka ku baana ba Israil nti mazima oyo atta omuntu atatemudde muntu, oba atakoze bwonoonefu mu nsi, mazima ddala aba nga asse abantu bonna., ate ataasa obulamu bw'omuntu omu aba nga ataasizza obulamu bwa bantu bonna, (ebyo abayudaaya baalibadde babitegeera) anti mazima ababaka baffe babaleetera amateeka amannyonnyofu, naye ate oluvanyuma lwekyo mazima bangi ku bo baasigala beeyisa bubi mu nsi

Mazima ddala empeera y’abo abalwanyisa Katonda n’omubaka we nebasaasaanya obwonoonefu mu nsi, (ekibonerezo kyabwe) kuttibwa, kukomererwa ku musaalaba, oba emikono na magulu gaabwe kutemwaako mu ngeri y’okuwaanyisibwa (nga bwebamutemako omukono ogwa dddyo, okugulu bamutemako kwa kkono) oba bawangangusibwe okuva mu nsi yaabwe, ekyo nno nga kubakkakkanya kuno ku nsi era nga ne ku lunaku lw’enkomerero bagenda kutuusibwako ebibonerezo ebikakali
Okugyako abo abeenenya nga temunabakwata, era mumanye nti mazima ddala Katonda musonyiyi nnyo omusaasizi
Abange mmwe abakkiriza mutye Katonda era munoonye ekkubo erituuka gy'ali, era munyiikire nnyo mu kuweereza mu kkubo lye, ekiribayamba okubeera mu balituuka ku buwangizi (ku lunaku lw’enkomerero)

Mazima abo abaakaafuwala singa mazima byonna ebiri mu nsi n’ebiringa byo nga obitadde wamu nebaagala okwenunula nabyo okuwona ebibonerezo by’olunaku lw’enkomerero, tebyandikkiriziddwa okuva gyebali, era baakussibwako e bibonerezo e biruma e nnyo
